devdoc.details: Factory contract to create and deploy instances of the NexeraVerifierEntrypoint contract.

NewVerifierEntrypointDeployed(address).details: Event emitted when a new VerifierEntrypoint contract is created.

params.scenarioVerifierAddress: The address of the newly deployed VerifierEntrypoint contract.

constructor.details: Constructor to set the implementation contract address.

params._implementationContract: The address of the VerifierEntrypoint implementation contract.

createVerifierEntrypoint().details: Creates a new VerifierEntrypoint contract and initializes it.

returns._0: clone The address of the newly created VerifierEntrypoint contract.

devdoc.title: VerifierEntrypointFactory
